| History                 = The Gambisi Family were one of the five families that ruled the underworld in [[New York City]] through their [[Tri-State Crime Syndicate (Earth-616)|Tri-State Syndicate]]. It's stronghold was in the borough of [[Bronx]], [[New York City]]. It controlled the dockworkers of Local 851, from which the [[Sanguino Family (Earth-616)|Sanguino Family]] received a cut.{{r|Kingpin Vol 2 1|7}}
